titles.title: Providing for a lump sum allowance for the Corrections Calendar Office.

action.text: Mr. Gutknecht asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/24/1997--Introduced. Provides for a lump sum allowance per fiscal year for the salaries and expenses of the Corrections Calendar Office to be allocated between the majority and minority party as determined by the Speaker of the House of Representatives.
